Board.title: Money
Board.goal: You must buy the different items and give the exact price. At higher levels, several items are displayed, and you must first calculate the total price.
Board.manual: Click on the coins or paper money at the bottom of the screen to pay. If you want to remove a coin or note, click on it on the upper screen area.
